name: upgrade_season_pass
attributes: # [doc = " シーズンパスのレベルを更新し、報酬を付与する  "]
# [doc = " (`season_pass_account` の owner チェックを一切行っていないため、  "]
# [doc = "  攻撃者が他人のシーズンパスを指定して無制限にレベルを上げ、報酬を横取りできます)"]
body: let pass_acc = & mut ctx . accounts . season_pass_account . to_account_info () ;
let data = & mut pass_acc . data . borrow_mut () ;
let now = Clock :: get () ? . unix_timestamp as u64 ;
* * ctx . accounts . reward_pool . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () = ctx . accounts . reward_pool . to_account_info () . lamports () . saturating_sub (reward_amount) ;
* * ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () += reward_amount ;
msg ! ("Season pass {} upgraded: {} → {} at {}, rewarded {} lamports" , pass_acc . key () , current_level , new_level , now , reward_amount) ;

fields.name: season_pass_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: owner == program_id の検証をまったく行っていない AccountInfo"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: reward_pool
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 報酬プールアカウント（owner チェックなし）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " アップグレードを行うユーザー（署名のみ検証）"] # [account (mut)]
